combos.name: Namekian Royalty
combos.lore: The rarest named combo in the entire collection. Only 7 exist. Piccolo Turban can ONLY appear on Alien Wojak bases, making this the ultimate DBZ tribute. When Piccolo removes the weighted training gear, game over.

combos.name: Royal Neckbeard
combos.lore: Two Tang Gang titans collide. Bullish0x's Crown psyop meets DegenWaffle's 'Winners Win' philosophy. The king who never shaves, never sells.

combos.name: Royal MOG
combos.lore: Royalty that mogs. When Crown meets MOG Glasses, the conversation isn't just over‚Äîit was never allowed to start. Peak flex energy.

combos.name: Classic Neckbeard
combos.lore: DegenWaffle's original signature loadout. The Fedora tips, the Neckbeard grows, the blade has been studied. Cyberpunk gambling degen royalty.

combos.name: Tang Gang Commander
combos.lore: TheStakerClass tribute combo. El Presidente was created specifically for him, and the Military Beret is his ChiaPhunks signature. Not elected‚Äîappointed.

combos.name: Full Ronin
combos.lore: OrangeGooey's legacy combo. Masterless samurai who answer to no one. 'Accept cookies' is delivered with tough love. Discipline over chaos.

combos.name: High Council
combos.lore: The High Council of Wizards is Tang Gang's magic community. Whiz nerds don't explain their methods‚Äîit just works. Pizza, pizza, pizza.

combos.name: Full Bepe
combos.lore: Tom Bepe's true believers. Wearing the Bepe Suit on a Bepe base means you're all-in on orange. $BEPE is the most liquid memecoin on Chia.

combos.name: Bepe Army
combos.lore: Tom Bepe's infantry division. The army marches in orange, not green. Two pieces and you're enlisted. The army grows with every convert.

combos.name: Full SWAT
combos.lore: Tactical precision loadout. 'Breach and clear' isn't a suggestion‚Äîit's the only approach. Find the alpha, execute the plan, don't hesitate.

combos.name: Full Firefighter
combos.lore: 'Buy the fire' mentality. While others panic when the market burns, firefighters run toward it. Red candles don't scare you.

combos.name: Full Viking
combos.lore: Raiders don't ask permission. Vikings conquered and built legends. Valhalla awaits those with diamond hands. Full armor means full commitment.

combos.name: Full Roman
combos.lore: The Roman Empire is a meme, but the grind is real. You're in the trenches and looking good doing it. The empire moved to crypto.

combos.name: Full Vampire
combos.lore: Dracattus tribute complete. Full vampire loadout means you hunt when the market is quiet. The thirst is real. Bloodline secured.

combos.name: Full Super Saiyan
combos.lore: DBZ transformation complete. When your portfolio dips, you power up. 'This isn't even my final form' energy. Power level over 9000.

combos.name: Full Clown
combos.lore: ChiaPhunks tribute complete. They called us clowns for buying JPEGs on Chia. We got the last laugh. Honk honk.

combos.name: Full Pirate
combos.lore: 'Take what you can, give nothing back.' Pirates don't ask permission. The eye patch is a badge of battles survived.

combos.name: Full Ninja Turtle
combos.lore: Cowabunga! Heroes in a half shell. Full Ninja Turtle is pure 90s nostalgia for degens who grew up on pizza and cartoons. Shell yeah.

combos.name: Asylum Patient
combos.lore: 'Silence of the degens.' The market tried to break you. It failed. Now you wear the straitjacket as a badge of honor. Too degen for therapy.

combos.name: Divine Loadout
combos.lore: Ascended beyond mortal degen status. Diamond hands so strong they're divine. Blessed gains only. Higher plane portfolio management.

combos.name: Angel in Heaven
combos.lore: Found your final resting place‚Äîand it's bullish. Angel in Heaven means you've ascended to where the gains are eternal.

combos.name: Devil in Hell
combos.lore: Sold your soul to the blockchain at 3am and you'd do it again. Devil in Hell means you've found your natural habitat. The fire fuels you.

combos.name: Lunar Landing
combos.lore: 'To the moon' isn't just a meme‚Äîit's a destination. And you've already arrived. While others are still hoping, you've already landed.

combos.name: Plot Secured
combos.lore: THE Chia combo. 'Farmed, not FOMO'd' is the Chia way. While others panic-bought, you plotted in silence. The plot is secured.

combos.name: Honk Gang
combos.lore: Honors Foods, the Goose of Tang Gang. Gene Hoffman promised to honk on Joe Rogan. 'Peace was never an option.' The suit alone joins you to the flock.

legendary.name: Legendary Combos
legendary.description: The rarest and most valuable combinations

single_trait.name: Single Trait Badges
single_trait.description: Badges earned from a single trait
